App Intro: AI-powered academic search and citation assistant.
App Detail: ScholarAI indexes over 100 million open papers, patents, and chain-verified datasets through A2V manifests. Its retrieval agents generate structured knowledge graphs, summarize findings, and compute citation impact scores. Researchers can stream peer-review data or fine-tune models using the built-in corpus API. Each data query is tracked and monetized through x402 micro-licensing.

App Intro: Distributed simulation engine for AI experiments.
App Detail: SimForge allows scientists to design large-scale reinforcement or physical simulations under A2V governance. Each simulation node publishes manifests describing state transitions, parameters, and reward functions. Outputs are hashed on-chain for reproducibility. Using x402, contributors earn tokens proportionally to compute time donated.

App Intro: Federated data marketplace for scientific collaboration.
App Detail: DataAtlas connects research institutions and private labs to share verified datasets without moving raw data. Agents negotiate access rights via A2V manifests, ensuring privacy while allowing federated learning. The hub tracks every data call and redistributes value using x402 settlement so contributors are automatically compensated.

NeuroScope provides interactive visualization for neural activation paths inside large models. It stores attention-layer metadata in an A2V vector index, enabling reproducible interpretability studies. Research groups integrate it into LLM alignment projects to quantify bias and reasoning drift. Each run emits an A2V audit manifest and optional x402 bounty for findings.

OpenLabX allows universities and corporate R&D teams to coordinate experiments via multi-agent collaboration. Protocol adapters sync experiment manifests, share model checkpoints, and verify authorship through chain-anchored timestamps. The system eliminates data-silo friction and automates contributor reward distribution.

MetaPaper enables researchers to publish peer-reviewed findings as immutable A2V manifests. It tracks citation lineage, peer-review status, and funding provenance. Journals can embed x402 micropayments for access or reward reviewers automatically. The platform is already used by decentralized AI conferences for transparent proceedings.

App Intro: Immutable ledger for experimental data provenance.
App Detail: LabChain logs experimental parameters, results, and authorship proofs directly to the chain using A2V schema. Labs can reconstruct the full audit trail of model training or drug-discovery experiments. Integration with x402 ensures funding entities can monitor ROI per research milestone.

App Intro: Repository for trained AI models under A2V governance.
App Detail: ModelHive hosts open and private models with detailed manifests describing datasets, architecture, and performance metrics. Contributors retain ownership and receive revenue splits through x402 when their models are reused or fine-tuned. The platform provides reproducibility verification and automatic license enforcement.

PaperMind's agents summarize hundreds of related papers into cohesive narratives and highlight methodological conflicts. It leverages A2V manifest linking to cite exact sources and attach versioned reasoning trees. Used by think-tanks and research funds for policy papers and horizon-scanning studies.

GrantFlow automates R&D funding disbursement based on verified experiment progress. It reads milestones from A2V manifests and releases payments through x402 escrow once validation agents confirm completion. Governments and NGOs employ GrantFlow to reduce administrative overhead and ensure transparency in research grants.
